compilation.translation[0].definitions[0: a book, list, record etc which consists of different pieces of information, songs etc
compilation.translation[0].definitions[1: the process of making a book, list, record etc from different pieces of information, songs etc

compilation.translation[1].definitions[1: in the US, when an accountant presents a financial statement without a promise that it meets GENERALLY ACCEPTED ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES, but which has been prepared according to the rules set out by the AMERICAN INSTITUTE OF CERTIFIED PUBLIC ACCOUNTANTS
